name: DGCP | MaMeeFarm™ — Proof 407 | Empty Duck Coop, Truth Without Assets
description:
This NFT documents a real condition at MaMeeFarm™ on
29 December 2025 at 08:28 (Asia/Bangkok).

The image records an empty duck coop with no livestock present.
No production, no assets, no support systems — only the remaining structure and daily reality.

Despite the absence of output, the act of documentation continues.
This proof exists to record reality as it is, not as it is expected to be.

Captured and preserved under the DGCP (Data Governance & Continuous Proof) framework.

DGCP | MMFARM-POL-2025
